verses.roman:
sahasrānīkas tat-putras
tataś caivāśvamedhajaḥ
asīmakṛṣṇas tasyāpi
nemicakras tu tat-sutaḥ

synonyms: sahasrānīkaḥ—Sahasrānīka; tat-putraḥ—the son of Śatānīka; tataḥ—from him (Sahasrānīka); ca—also; eva—indeed; aśvamedhajaḥ—Aśvamedhaja; asīmakṛṣṇaḥ—Asīmakṛṣṇa; tasya—from him (Aśvamedhaja); api—also; nemicakraḥ—Nemicakra; tu—indeed; tat-sutaḥ—his son.
translation: The son of Śatānīka will be Sahasrānīka, and from him will come the son named Aśvamedhaja. From Aśvamedhaja will come Asīmakṛṣṇa, and his son will be Nemicakra.
